data.title: Best Cancer Hospitals in Delhi NCR, India, Cancer Treatment & Research Center
data.meta_description: RGCIRC is one of the top cancer treatment hospitals & research centre in Delhi NCR, India aimed at providing best of Oncological Care to those who need it. Low cost & superior quality services of this institute are main reasons for patients to come for getting cancer treatment.
data.meta_site_name: Rajiv Gandhi Cancer Institute & Research Centre
data.text:
My father Jarnail Singh Virdi had successfull Ivor Lewis Esophagectomy surgery for food pipe cancer which was performed by Dr LM Darlong. I would like to specially thanks Dr Darlong for taking care of my father. From Day-1, he was very confident and cleared about the approach he needs to follow. He was very much [‚Ä¶]

Hi there,Me Madhav Adhikari from Kathmandu.I did Surgery( CA Gall Bladder) with Dr Shivendera Singh on 2021.(CR 296519) and continuing follow up with him.As per his advice I have to make an appointment to see Dr Varun Goel with Tele -medicine but could not register for it.Request to suggest me on my what‚Äôs App Number [‚Ä¶]

Words are not enough to express my gratitude for Rajiv Gandi Cancer Hospital. I‚Äôm very happy l came to the right place in the right time. I‚Äôm satisfied by all your services. I am writing this review on behalf of my mother Kaushal Papneja who is currently undergoing treatment at Neeti Bagh Hospital. Words fail to express the exceptional care and support provided by the entire staff at this hospital. From the attentive guards at the entrance to the helpful assistants who ensured my mother‚Äôs comfort as [‚Ä¶]

I want to appreciate Dr. Narendra Agarwal for his calm and cool behaviour and positive approach during my treatment of Leukemia. Also want to appreciate nursing staffs Sugam Vashisth, Sonu and Rakhi Thapa of day care for their dedication and proper care during my chemotherapy. Bes

my daycare chemo is due on 20 March.i submitted document for day care on 28 Feb for approval.but till today TPA deptt hasn‚Äôt submitted to my Cigna ins Co.today I called tpa they replied it‚Äôll be done.but yet I haven‚Äôt recd any msg.plz look into the issue.otherwise my whole day of 20 March will be [‚Ä¶]

My brother, Bhabi & I want to say thank you from the bottom of our hearts to Dr Savera and her team for their guidance, kindness and constant support during our trying time. We appreciate the team‚Äôs dedication and commitment for weekly visitation. Care provided to our mother was exceptional & we are gratefulüôè

My Father in law was diagnosed with Stage 4 cancer and we opted for Palliative Care. Under the able and personal care of Dr Savera, we were able to weather the journey. Dr Savera would visit weekly and she would give morale booster not only to the patient but also to the immediate family along [‚Ä¶]

My wife Amrit Kaur Sehgal & mother of Navneet Kaur was suffering from Cerebrovascular Accident ‚Äì Right Hemiparesis since Nov 1999 and Carcinoma Duodenum with gastric outlet obstruction, GI Bleed since 2018. On the recommendation of Dr. P.N. Singh of Holy Family Hospital that we should now go for Palliative Care and Pain Management . [‚Ä¶]

Experiencing palliative care for our mother‚Äôs cancer journey was a profound relief. It not only eased the physical pain from treatments but also provided crucial emotional support. The compassionate counseling for both our mother and us alleviated the burden of facing the end of life. Palliative care became a beacon of comfort, allowing us to [‚Ä¶]

I was diagnosed with Osteosarcoma ( bone cancer ) when I was 13 year old. I underwent 10 surgeries and 15 chemocycles. Post surgery my backbone shifted sideways and limbs became disproportionate. I have faced lots of ups and downs during my treatment including many paralysis attacks. My family has been my biggest support system [‚Ä¶]

I was 14 year old when diagnosed with lymphoblastic Lymphoma. I have been off therapy for more than 10 years now. I was always very passionate about Theater and Dramatics. After completing my schooling, I enrolled myself for a Diploma course in Fashion Design in 2017. I went to Lucknow alone, to learn Theatre and [‚Ä¶]

I was six years old when I was diagnosed with Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia. Being from a middle class family it was not easy for my parents to take treatment form a private hospital. They were told to save money for my younger siblings, rather than spending for such expensive treatment because according to their perception, [‚Ä¶]

Iam yuvi. I was diagnosed with throat cancer ( Hodgkin‚Äôs lymphoma) at pediatric ward . I was very nervous and depressed before visiting pediatric ward but doctor‚Äôs open communication made the things easy for me . After biopsy and Pet ct scan my treatment started soon . It was very difficult to cope up with [‚Ä¶]

On behalf of the Prakash Family, I am writing to provide a heartfelt testimonial for the palliative care team at Rajiv Gandhi Cancer Institute and Research Centre in Niti Bagh. On 17th of Feb planning for radio-therapy is completed after that from 22nd of Feb is supposed to began as told by doctor and also we have received 3 therapy on regular basis but after that because of some technical issues at hospital i have not received the therapy at regular basis. I just want [‚Ä¶]

I had admitted my patient at 1230 Hrs in afternoon and till now no treatment is started. I am facing this issue 2nd time in the hospital. Earlier as well when I admitted, this happened, i provided my feedback but nothing happened. It seems that hospital management is not taking the feedbacks seriously and it‚Äôs [‚Ä¶]

The worst service and coordination during patient admission. My patient admitted at 1430 Hrs and it‚Äôs 1930 now. I am still standing with nothing in my hands. No treatment is provided yet even after admitting the patient in afternoon.

Worst care of attandent in gastroenterology ward 3. I have particular complaint against the supervisor of wardboys-shambu Wardboys didn‚Äôt give atleast 1extra bedsheet to attendent at night. We were not even get informed about this so we can arrange it in daytime This shortage or whatever I say is happening in so called India‚Äôs top [‚Ä¶]

This feedback is for the ward boys and girls of 4D/OPD: Komal, Anuradha, Roma, Sourabh, Niranjan, Surendar, Neeraj, Vishkarma, Sonu, Bipin, Saurab, Ram Swaroop, Bam Bam, Tulsi, Rohit (4C). If I miss any name then its my fault as every one in 4D are the nicest person.

Dr. Mini was very helpful and supportive throughout my mother‚Äôs treatment. Her medicines helped my mother alot in subsiding the symptoms. She was promptly available for helping us over call/video call throughout the day. Although we could not save our mother due to the advanced stage of the disease, but we will always be thankful [‚Ä¶]

We took homeopathy treatment of Dr.Mini for our mother. She was suffering from tongue and neck problem. Dr.Mini was very supportive throughout her treatment.She was readily and promptly available for any situation to help our mother through call/whatsapp/video call. She treated my mother not only as a patient, but also as a human. Though, we [‚Ä¶]

I was diagnosed with GCT (A type of Benign bone tumour), indeed it was a toughest journey but Dr.Himanshu Rohela Sir and the team(Dr.Deepak) treated at its best. Now I am totally confident for my life.

1. Patient diet is very good and it is hygienically prepared and delivered. Moreover, they keep on modifying the facilities according to the patient‚Äôs request/feedback which is always in the interest of the IPD patients. I strongly recommend a mention for the Chief Dietitian and staff of the kitchen. 2. The homely support and quick [‚Ä¶]

Satisfied with services of rgcirc but special mention for an helping employee of your staff is Anubhav singh who is fully responsible,well spoken and well mannered ..a greatful thanks to him

The nursing staff needs rigorous training of attending patients. Came to daycare today and Ms. Meenakshi, the Nurse on duty was so casual in attending. Even for 2-3 patients at her Risk, she was annoyed and lethargic to attend. My patient had a port issue so I Requested to call a senior Nurse to monitor [‚Ä¶]

Feedback for Mr. Anubhav Singh and Ms Sheetal who work with Dr. Sumit Goyal. Both are extremely helpful and courteous. They take extra care of the patients waiting to meet doctor and ensure orderly and timely appointment process. I hope that hospital management rewards them in appropriate manner to appreciate their contribution.

The wardboy team at Dr Sumit Goyal‚Äôs OPD Mr. Anubhav Singh, Ms. Renu Kumari, Sheetal is so helpful that it feels homely when we come to visit here. they should be appreciated for their hard work and empathy they Show to the patients. May God bless them.

A SHORT OUTLINE ABOUT MY EXPERIENCE DURING MY TREATMENT AT RGCIRC My name is Ankit Verma, I am 18 years old boy and have just graduated my high school. I was diagnosed with osteosarcoma (a type of malignant bone tumor) on Jan 1, 2021. I have completed my treatment in the paedatric department of Rajiv [‚Ä¶]

my father underwent oral cancer surgery last year‚Ä¶by dr A.k dewan..he is no less than god to us‚Ä¶he assured us 100% ‚Ä¶.they provide us best care n therapy‚Ä¶he underwent radiation therapy.. from last 11mths he is taking Homoeopathic treatment by dr Mini mehta‚Ä¶she is d best dr‚Ä¶she is available anytime u need any kind of [‚Ä¶]

Thankyou to dr Shivendra and team . Perfect place for cancer like illness All diagnostics , pharmacy everything under one roof . Professional staff with good sense of patient care . Systematic manazement Recommended to all because all your diagnosis and treatment will be decided very soon no delay . Thankyou RGCIRC

This feedback is for Dr. Mini Mehta under whose supervision my father‚Äôs palliative treatment is going on. My father is suffering from brain tumor and after first surgery and then making family decision of not undergoing chemotherapy and radiotherapy, we decided to start palliative treatment for him through Dr. Mini Mehta. I am happy that [‚Ä¶]

I am RGCI patient and here the doctors and staff treat their patients like there own, very humble and kind, Recently met Dr. Mini Mehta(homeopathic) she is very kind, gave pain medicine after which i felt very good and didn‚Äôt had pain killer n give awesome counselling also.

Cancer in the right breast was detected in March 2019. Dr. Rajeev/ Dr. Garima operated on my wife at that time. But instead of complete removal of the breast, he only removed the lymph nodes. But since the cancer was in the breast and it was the source of the cancerous cell in lymph nodes. [‚Ä¶]

Never imagined that a hospital experience could be so comforting and assuring‚Ä¶From day one of our visit at RGCIRC, Dr. Sumit Goyal has managed and handled the treatment in the best possible manner.. Words could never express our gratitude for all that Dr. Sumit Goyal has done for my mother. Sir, you are a truly [‚Ä¶]

There are a few points that i will like to mention- 1. I would like to appreciate dr. Sumit for dealing with patients full calm and attention. Cancer being such a big disease, patient and family need treatment as well as moral support which is provided by him. Also, he tells deep insights about the [‚Ä¶]

The support staff ( Anubhav Singh) is very supportive guided me where to reach dr.. With his help I could find an easier way.. He helped me in submitting d report.. Helped me in collected the report.. Vey polite Very supportive Thanks to him..

Owsome patient care and treatment system. Dr Abeshek Bansal helped us and provided proper proffessional direction. THANKS TO HIM. I am treated by highly skilled team of Doctors ( Dr shivindra and team ) They were skillful and gave me second life by providing right treatment and care. Thanks to the team. Suggestions. There has [‚Ä¶]

Treated by most experienced doctor panel of Dr. Sudhir Rawal and team. Doctor explained each and every points regarding the disease and it‚Äôs treatment procedure step by step. Also nursing/ward boy staff is so much helpful and co-operating.

Advantages:- 1) Very Efficient Doctors 2) Cleanliness and Hygienic atmosphere 3) World Class treatment and standards 4) Transparency 5) Friendly atmosphere Disadvantages:‚Äì 1) Parking Problem 2) Expensive / non compromiser or rigded staff 3) Crowded 4) Less Efficient cash counter staff or need some more cash counters 5) Crowded Pharmacy counter

When you hear the word ‚Äòcancer,‚Äô your world changes in an instant and so happened with us.We came to Rajeev Gandhi Cancer Hospital for my mother‚Äôs treatment.She was diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer.Fortunately,they diagnosed it at a very early stage and did surgery in no time.She has recovered alot and getting back to her [‚Ä¶]

A special thank to Dr. Sumit Goyal for his support in this journey till date. He always try to take extra care and really soft in his tone.

Dr. Manish Sharma was very friendly, gave genuine advise, but Dr. Ulhas Batra was in hurry. He just gave me around 2 minutes time. He even did not tell, why tiny nodule foci developed in my lungs. Therefore it was my last visit there.

I had gone for advise of doctor regarding colonoscopy with all old papers but probably doctor was in hurry. He did not satisfied my quarries. I returned back, now seeking other doctors opinion. Also abnormal charges for tests. If one will pay this, he should be completely satisfied.

ADO Sameer Nagpal of RGCIRC is very mannerless and inhuman. Dear Dr Bhurani, I wanted to thank you so much for all your work and help with my brother, Mohammad Khabir from Ukraine. I am so grateful for all the help you did and I am very happy with the treatment you gave my brother and helping in his diagnosis of his condition. You were [‚Ä¶]

POOR BEHAVIOR OF IP BILLING STAFF. me and my wife(had surgery past week)visited IP Billing staff for discrepancy related to billing. Despite the fact that entire amount of bill was already paid and an amount of around Rs 1100/- was due on hospital, Staff named Sh Shamim Baig sitting on counter at around 10:30 AM [‚Ä¶]

Dr Dinesh Bhurani and his team did BMT. Thanks for their devotion towards treatment.Talented people they are.BMT unit nurses are best nurses .Thanks to Dr Bhurani and his whole team.

The waiting room layout on 2nd floor near OPD Triage is poorly laid out. Chairs are facing away from the sampling waiting list. How is one supposed to see it without turning 180 degrees. Similarly a TV is placed at 90 degrees to the left of the waiting room chairs. It‚Äôs quite weird.

Dr dheeraj unit head dr ullas batra team keep us waiting since last 2 hours as discharge has been written at 11.30 but now at this time it is 1.50 PM and he is not giving us same and roaming here and there delaying the matter room no 3371

In patient diet no provision for salted biscuits. Even on request cafeteria people said please manage by own. Why and who is decided that salted biscuit is not suitable for patient . Dietitian service is very poor.

Dr. L.M Darlong successfully performed surgery to remove tumour from my Father‚Äôs right lung. Throughout the whole treatment by Dr Darlong, I & my father felt at ease and were always well informed by the Doctor. Darlong Sir is a great doctor and on top of it, he is a great human being. Very thankful [‚Ä¶]

I am really overwhelmed by care and support doctors showed towards us. Will never forget Dr. Gauri Kapoor and Dr. Sandeep Jain in my life. They‚Äôre very qualified, experienced and committed doctors.

No one should go through such a pain but once engraved with, then have to become a greatest fighter of all time. My Mother got diagnosed with Blood Cancer in the month of February 2019 and by the grace of God we reached RGCIRC and since then she is being treated in here. RGCIRC has [‚Ä¶]

I am not getting my said report daily i am calling but no body giving me right answer pls tell me when will be get the report Thanks Seema Gupta 9818293133 8076196746

Very poor management. I had booked an appoinment since friday for Monday for 2 pm. I visited hospital around 1:15. And its 4 pm and i have no idea if the doctor will be able to see us. If the doctor has to see admitted patients or other review patients in the appointed time, why [‚Ä¶]

Sir there is no cashless TPA panel facility available. I am almost running short of funds since reimbursement gets delayed from insurance Co. Also there is no senior citizen discount. Injections are available at hospital are higher of price than available in market. Would request to help people like us who is not weak by [‚Ä¶]

This is the second time, my father is getting treated in this hospital ‚Äì around 7 years later. The experience from then to now has been abysymally low and pathetic. 1) The Security staff treats the patient‚Äôs family members as some thief. They misbehave , talk rudely and are highly insensitive. They are definitely not [‚Ä¶]

To the CEO‚Ä¶ My brother in law, Varun Sharma is undergoing treatment in your esteemed hospital. Till date he had undergone a surgery and 2 cycles of chemotherapy. 21st June, 2019 he was admitted for his 3rd cycle of Chemotherapy. Respected Sir, I would like to draw your attention towards certain matters. First of all, [‚Ä¶]

R/sir, The problem with the Hospital is discharge issue if doctor admit for one day and we want to vaccinate the room next day morning then why you not allow us and charge for 2 days after 4 o‚Äôclock why? You charge 3 times for same room 1stily one patient who already admitted then 2ndily [‚Ä¶]

We first came to Rajiv Gandhi Cancer Institute & Research Center in 2004 for our son Utkarsh who was 3 years old then & he was diagnosed with high risk ALL. We met Dr Gauri Kapoor who gave us hope and set us forward in those very tough moments ‚Äì today when we look back [‚Ä¶]

I, Sonia Chopra (33 years) resident from Faridabad, was diagnosed with Breast Cancer by Sarvodaya Hospital (Faridabad). With the intent of getting best and efficient cancer treatment reached to ‚ÄúRAJIV GANDHI CANCER INSTITUTE ROHINI‚Äù and was treated by Dr. Rajiv Kumar & Garima, where I requested for ‚ÄòMasectomy‚Äô (Removal of the whole breast), however, Dr. [‚Ä¶]

Hospital is well equipped and updated with the technology and staff. I wish best of luck to everyone associated with the hospital. All the support staff along with all the doctors are very soft spoken and cooperative.

The hospital is much better than expected. All the staff are very supportive and caring. 50% relief is with the care and behavior.

Overall management of the hospital is excellent. All the staff is very cooperative, especially Dr. Sajjan Rajpurohit is very helping and his patient‚Äôs dealing ability is excellent.

Staff nurses are very good. They took very good care of me. It was a good experience in this hospital, everything is good here. I would like to thank all the staff who took good care of my patient.

All the staff, but Dr. Sajjan has a smile and encourages us to keep cool and relaxed which is more important at this times.

Its an excellent service you provide for the patients. Staff at all levels cadres are courteous, helpful and competent, facilities are very good and treatment is state of the art.

By the God‚Äôs grace 7 months have passed as per I got to know my mother is suffering with CA. Thankful to each and every concerned person to whom I had met and if anybody doesn‚Äôt like my attitude and made anyone agitated so please forgive that. Really thankful to everyone and foremost to the [‚Ä¶]
